data.title: WPKN Radio Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: How much does it cost to advertise on WPKN-FM. Find radio advertising rates for WPKN-FM in Connecticut.
data.text:
How much does it cost to advertise on WPKN-FM? We've got the information you need!

Why Advertise on WPKN?

WPKN-FM listeners in the New York, NY area are waiting to hear from you about your offerings. It is owned by WPKN Inc. The radio station format is variety. To learn more, tune in to 89.5 FM.

Cost of WPKN-FM Radio Advertising

As a non-commercial station, WPKN-FM is federally prohibited from carrying regular spot advertising. A company may be able to associate itself with this station through public radio station sponsorship underwriting, giving you a cost-effect marketing tactic and community philanthropy points in the process.

To inquire about sponsorship opportunities, please contact WPKN-FM at (203) 331-9756.

WPKN-FM Contact Information

WPKN-FM

244 University Ave

Bridgeport, CT 6604

Phone: (203) 331-9756

Fax:

To update or correct radio advertising information on this page, please use the link below:
